pageProduct.name: Thompson's One-A-Day Valerian 2000mg 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Traditionally used in Western Herbal Practice to support sleeplessness and stress

Thompson's One-A-Day Valerian contain a high strength valerian extract formulated for convenience with a One-A-Day dose. It is used in traditional Western herbal practice to:
- Support sleeplessness and disturbed restless sleep
- Support symptoms of stress
- Support nervous tension
- Support restlessness and excess nervous energy
- Support digestive spasms

KEY FEATURES

• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly

Warnings

If symptoms persist see your healthcare professional

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active Ingredients per capsule:
Valeriana officinalis (Valerian) ext. 400mg
derived from dry root 2g(2000mg)
std. to contain valerenic acids 3.2mg

Directions

Adults - Take one capsule daily (with food). This can be increased to two capsules daily or as professionally prescribed

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
